Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VE WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL

INSERT INTO CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VE ( H2VECODI, PROYCODI, HORA, CONSUMOENERGETICO, PRODUCCIONCENTRAL, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :H2VECODI, :PROYCODI, :HORA, :CONSUMOENERGETICO, :PRODUCCIONCENTRAL, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VE SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, HORA = :HORA, CONSUMOENERGETICO = :CONSUMOENERGETICO, PRODUCCIONCENTRAL = :PRODUCCIONCENTRAL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE H2VECODI = :H2VECODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VE ORDER BY H2VECODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VE SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VE WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
